item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, September 1, 2024 at 5:10 PM UTC
item.description:

2. Founder Mode (466 points | 325 comments)

21. Build Your Own Z80 Computer: Design Guidelines and Application (1981) (66 points | 11 comments)

29. MapRoulette: the micro-tasking tool for OpenStreetMap (84 points | 29 comments)
